explains: adj. 男孩的；孩子气的；（女孩）像男孩的

sentences.en: His face had lost its boyish roundness.
sentences.cn: 他的脸已不是小时候那副圆圆的娃娃脸了。

sentences.en: He was beguilingly boyish and attractive.
sentences.cn: 他散发着迷人的孩子气和魅力。

sentences.en: She had her long hair cut into a boyish crop.
sentences.cn: 她让人把她的长发剪成了像男孩子的短发。
